outputs.output_descr: Real time information via information communications technology accessible to rural and deprived communities to be able to engage and participate in national issues. Capacity of selected communities developed to be able to engage leaders in the debate of national issues

project_descr: This project aims at deploying ICT to deprived and under-served districts to improve decentralization by making information accessible for effective planning, administration and governing purposes.
project_title: Dist.Connect'y  for  Effective  Decent. & Digital inclus
